channel.title: Latest from Francesco La Camera
channel.description: Francesco La Camera's personal web space.

item.title: Short server downtime... I did an oopsie.
item.description: So...erm, I was just playing with a Makefile that would deploy my website onto the server and all... long story short, I *acidentally* sent an 'rm -rf /*' to my server. I know, right. Didn't loose much though. Thank god I keep auto backups on daily. The server should be back online within a few minutes.

item.title: My first RSS entry
item.description: This is my first RSS entry. It does nothing :)
